title: News: The Knife Drop a Mysterious New Video
body:
[**The Knife**](http://theknife.net/) have posted a cryptic new video on their website that hints at the possibility of a new album in 2013. It features;

1.  Feet
2.  A woman
3.  A woman on a swing
4.  A party

Head over to their [**website**](http://theknife.net/) to watch or stream it below. I’d love to bore you with my analysis but I’m off to work. Omg sad face. As always, more when we get it.
